title: Date Addition Function
description:
DATE_ADD add days, weeks, months, and add years to a
date. First the module adds the specifed days and weeks, then months
and fnally the years. 
The input values can be both positive as well be negative. So it can also
be subtracted from a date.
Note that especially for negative input values the sum of negative values,
i.e. -3000 days does not run below 1.1.1970 because this would have an
overfow of data type DATE and undefned values are obtained.
name: DATE_ADD

input.name: IDATE
input.description: The initial date to which the adjustments will be made.

input.name: D
input.description: The number of days to add to the initial date.

input.name: W
input.description: The number of weeks to add to the initial date.

input.name: M
input.description: The number of months to add to the initial date.

input.name: Y
input.description: The number of years to add to the initial date.

return_value.description: The resulting date after the specified additions.
